title: Philip Rucker & Carol Leonnig | Jokes Seth Can't Tell
description:
There are some jokes that just sound wrong coming from Seth, like the one about Megan Rapinoe on the cover of Sports Illustrated.

The, journalists Philip Rucker and Carol Leonnig discuss documenting the Trump administration in their book A Very Stable Genius and speaking with anonymous sources.

They also take a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
